group_1.textLeft: ...You're acting strange, suddenly cutting@off your attacks like that...

group_1.textRight: ...In that case, you've been acting@bizarre too, Yachan...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: How can I put it... Aren't you paying more@attention to me than to the Witch's movements?
...On top of that, your expression is so stiff...@like you're afraid of something...

group_1.textLeft: ...Afraid?

group_1.narration: I don't want to lose anyone close to me ever again.@The thought of losing them...scares me.

group_1.textLeft: (Yeah...that's exactly right.)
(But where did this anxiety come from...?)
(What it seems like to me...)
(It's like this feeling is being dragged out of me...)
...Could this be the effect of that@attack from earlier?
Have our deepest fears been brought@to the forefront...?
It's the same for you? To happen so suddenly...

group_1.textRight: It's off balance...! Now, to follow up...
Right! This is the end...

group_1.narration: If that's the case...@I'd rather things just stay the way they are...

group_1.textRight: ...I thought that if that Witch is defeated,@I'll forget.

group_1.textLeft: Forget...?

group_1.textRight: Once that Witch is gone...
I'll forget about Mel...
Leaving everything in the past.
And someday, no one will remember her...

group_1.textLeft: That's not true.
Even after we defeat that Witch,
the days I spent with Mel won't disappear.

group_1.textRight: I know...
But...but, I'm afraid...
I thought I was ready for this...@But all of a sudden I was afraid...
Moving on to the future means leaving@the dead behind.
And I don't want that...!
So I'd rather keep everything the same...
That's why I couldn't...bring myself to attack...

group_1.textLeft: Mifuyu...
(I'm certain that it was the Witch's attack@that brought out our fear...)
(But this is still a thought that Mifuyu has@been carrying deep inside...)

group_1.textRight: Then, go on and live your life. We'll be waiting.

group_1.textLeft: Being afraid to make a break...@Being afraid to change.
That's...understandable.
But, that won't do.
Mel, and Kanae too, they want to move@on to the future as well.
That's what they hoped for.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Their belongings were left behind@at Mikazuki Villa...

group_1.narration: I'm just a point@Standing up for myself in the world@To survive here I have to stay sharp@To dirty my hands real ugly
You pull me up by those stained hands@And tell me to get myself clean@But your blunt words just break me down
One point will pierce through on its own@Two points will slash together as a line@With three, the edges start to soften, melt@Form a circle, round the edges
I never thought that my way into the future@Could ever feel this kind@Just by holding hands
As strange phenomena occur in Kamihama,@they may bring about some big upheavals.@However, many points will form a pattern:@the gentle shape of a ring.
Perhap it's a ring of people.@Maybe a ring spun by us Magical Girls.@These times are the most dangerous yet@but will also be full of mutual kindness.
A lone star will present the opportunity.@That star must symbolize a person.@And it falls near Yachiyo.
I don't know if this person is the cause@but I'm excited to meet them nonetheless.
Because the star falling by Yachiyo@means I'll definitely get to meet them too.

group_1.textRight: The two of them said that...

group_1.textLeft: I've read those words so many times that I've memorized them.
Mifuyu.
“All things happen when they must.”

group_1.textRight: That's what Mel's mother said...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Today, we met that Witch because we needed to.
In order to make sure that the feelings those@girls left behind won't go to waste.

group_1.textRight: ...So we have to overcome this, here and now.

group_1.textLeft: You can move past your fears, I believe in you.
I know that you won't let yourself be crushed@by that fear in a place like this.
Believe in that, and fight.

group_1.textRight: ...Yes.
I won't let my insecurities get the better of me.
I'll face my fears and move on...to the future!
